HMM visualizations in Python
======================================

It becomes easy to visualize `profile hidden Markov models (pHMMs) <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HMMER#Profile_HMMs>`_ with ``hmmlogo``::

  import hmmlogo
  hmmlogo.save_svg('PF10000', 'hmm.svg')
